Product Title: Blue Sage De-Puffing Caffeine Eye Serum | Natural Anti-Aging Eye Treatment with Probiotics, Green Tea + Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Face to Tighten and Hydrate under Eye Skin, and Brighten Dark Circles

Store: Blue Sage

Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.06 x 1.65 x 1.42 inches; 4.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '860004070450', 'Manufacturer': 'Blue Sage Skin Co'}
Review Text: I couldn't use this product at all. Any time I tried to apply to my under eye it would burn really badly. I would have to immediately wipe it off. I always used a clean face when I applied this and it still burned.
Review Title: Burned and I couldn't use
Rating: 1.0

reference_summary:
DeepDream Portable Electric Nail Drill - Professional Efile Nail Drill Kit For Acrylic, Gel Nails, Manicure Pedicure Polishing Shape Tools with 11Pcs Nail Drill Bits and 36 Sanding Bands
Deep Dream
{'Brand': 'Deep Dream', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Maximum Rotational Speed': '20000 RPM', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 2.6 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '191762584966', 'Manufacturer': 'Deep Dream'}
Just used the deep dream electric nail drill.  Love it, I will not use nail files again! Loved that it has a speed control where it can be slow to very fast for acrylic nails. It worked great on my natural nails. Will definitely keep using it!
Works fantastic! No more nail file for me!
VOOADA Electric for Face, Arm, Waist, Belly, Leg, Hip
VOOADA
{'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 7.87 x 2.05 inches; 1.37 Pounds', 'UPC': '699936288523'}
Great nail set! At first I thought it didn't come with any attachments, but they're actually on the bottom!
Easy to use!
Fog-free Dental Mirror and 4 Pieces of Stainless Steel Dental Pick Professional Oral Care Kit for Family including Dogs Oral Care
Sunrise glow
{'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 2.4 x 1.3 inches; 4.23 Ounces'}
The tools are exactly what you'd expect. I really just wanted this pack for the mirror. Well, I got it and now I realize I need to make a dental appointment! In all seriousness, the mirror works okay but after I pulled the protective plastic cover off it started to scratch badly. Don't know why.
Okay

profile:
User Profile Summary:

- **Nail and Oral Care Enthusiast**: The user is dedicated to high-quality grooming, emphasizing the importance of professional-grade tools for both nail care and oral hygiene, while now also exploring skincare.

- **Preference for Efficiency**: They seek tools that streamline their grooming routines, showcasing a consistent inclination towards technology that enhances user-friendliness across various grooming applications.

- **Quality Assurance**: High performance and usability are paramount, with the user favoring products that provide pleasant experiences—highlighted by an appreciation for gentle formulations and enjoyable scents.

- **Positive Experience with Versatility**: The user values multifunctional products that cater to various grooming needs, emphasizing a commitment to an adaptable toolkit that seamlessly blends different tools.

- **Consistent Use**: They actively incorporate products into their regular routines, demonstrating dedication to sustained care across grooming practices.

- **Critical Feedback with Constructive Insight**: The user exhibits a thoughtful approach to reviews, providing balanced, critical feedback. They recently experienced significant disappointment with a product that caused irritation, highlighting sensitivity to product quality and effectiveness.

Overall, this user continues to prioritize high-quality, versatile, and efficient grooming tools, open to exploring new products that meet their high performance and usability standards. Their latest interaction indicates a growing focus on skincare while maintaining a critical stance toward product quality.
